block.p: LEAD: PPG Industries said its first-quarter earnings rose 25.6 percent, to $86.9 $69.2 million, or 59 cents a share, in the first quarter of 1986. It cited a modestly larger market share, acquisitions and currency transactions. The Pittsburgh-based manufacturer said sales for the three months ended March 31 totaled $1.26 billion, up 10.5 percent from $1.14 billion a year ago.
